title: Introducing: Om Shankar
body:
This debut track from **Om Shankar** is rather beautiful.

Merging elements from the likes of RY X and BANNERS, it’s emotive, verging on anthemic, and surely a sign of even better to come. Check out _Holy Man_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
